verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon. <S%H8010><s%> A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> makes a glad <S%H8055><s%> father; <S%H1><s%> but a foolish <S%H3684><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> brings grief <S%H8424><s%> to his mother. <S%H517><s%>
Treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> profit <S%H3276><s%> nothing, <S%H6666><s%> but righteousness delivers <S%H5337><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will not allow <S%H7456><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> to go hungry, <S%H7456><s%> but he thrusts away <S%H1920><s%> the desire <S%H1942><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
He becomes poor <S%H7326><s%> who works <S%H6213><s%> with a lazy <S%H7423><s%> hand, <S%H3709><s%> but the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> brings wealth. <S%H6238><s%>

He who gathers <S%H103><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> is a wise <S%H7919><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> but he who sleeps <S%H7290><s%> during the harvest <S%H7105><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> who causes shame. <S%H954><s%>
Blessings <S%H1293><s%> are on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> but violence <S%H2555><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
The memory <S%H2143><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is blessed, <S%H1293><s%> but the name <S%H8034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will rot. <S%H7537><s%>
The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> accept <S%H3947><s%> commandments, <S%H4687><s%> but a chattering <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> will fall. <S%H3832><s%>
He who walks <S%H3212><s%> blamelessly <S%H8537><s%> walks <S%H3212><s%> surely, <S%H983><s%> but he who perverts <S%H6140><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> will be found out. <S%H3045><s%>
One winking <S%H7169><s%> with the eye <S%H5869><s%> causes <S%H5414><s%> sorrow, <S%H6094><s%> but a chattering <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> will fall. <S%H3832><s%>

The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a spring <S%H4726><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> but violence <S%H2555><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Hatred <S%H8135><s%> stirs up <S%H5782><s%> strife, <S%H4090><s%> but love <S%H160><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> all wrongs. <S%H6588><s%>

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> on the lips <S%H8193><s%> of him who has discernment, <S%H995><s%> but a rod <S%H7626><s%> is for the back <S%H1460><s%> of him who is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
Wise <S%H2450><s%> men lay up <S%H6845><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the foolish <S%H191><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> ruin. <S%H4288><s%>
The rich man <S%H6223><s%>'s wealth <S%H1952><s%> is his strong <S%H5797><s%> city. <S%H7151><s%> The destruction <S%H4288><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> is their poverty. <S%H7389><s%>
The labor <S%H6468><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> leads to life. <S%H2416><s%> The increase <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> leads to sin. <S%H2403><s%>
He is in the way <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> who heeds <S%H8104><s%> correction, <S%H4148><s%> but he who forsakes <S%H5800><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> leads others astray. <S%H8582><s%>
He who hides <S%H3680><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%> has lying <S%H8267><s%> lips. <S%H8193><s%> He who utters <S%H3318><s%> a slander <S%H1681><s%> is a fool. <S%H3684><s%>

In the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> there is no lack <S%H2308><s%> of disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> but he who restrains <S%H2820><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> does wisely. <S%H7919><s%>
The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is like choice <S%H977><s%> silver. <S%H3701><s%> The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is of little worth. <S%H4592><s%>
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> many, <S%H7227><s%> but the foolish <S%H191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> for lack <S%H2638><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s blessing <S%H1293><s%> brings wealth, <S%H6238><s%> and he adds <S%H3254><s%> no trouble to it. <S%H6089><s%>
It is a fool <S%H3684><s%>'s pleasure <S%H7814><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> wickedness, <S%H2154><s%> but wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%>'s pleasure.
What the wicked <S%H7563><s%> fear, <S%H4034><s%> will overtake <S%H935><s%> them, <S%H8378><s%> but the desire of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be granted. <S%H5414><s%>
When the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> passes, <S%H5674><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is no more; <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous stand firm <S%H3247><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
As vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to the teeth, <S%H8127><s%> and as smoke <S%H6227><s%> to the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> so is the sluggard <S%H6102><s%> to those who send him. <S%H7971><s%>
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> prolongs <S%H3254><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> but the years <S%H8141><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be shortened. <S%H7114><s%>
The prospect <S%H8431><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is joy, <S%H8057><s%> but the hope <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will perish. <S%H6><s%>
The way <S%H1870><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the upright, <S%H8537><s%> but it is a destruction <S%H4288><s%> to the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will never <S%H5769><s%> be removed, <S%H4131><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will not dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> brings forth <S%H5107><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> but the perverse <S%H8419><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> will be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> what is acceptable, <S%H7522><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is perverse. <S%H8419><s%>
